segments.text: Hi Wei , what are you going to do this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I ’ ll stay in on Saturday and rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , I ’ m going to the pub to watch the football .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh really ? I ’ ll come along with you if that ’ s ok .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , you ’ re more than welcome . I ’ m meeting everyone at three o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh great , I ’ ll see you there !
segments.speaker: S1
